# An In-Depth Look at Peto's Paradox using the AnAge database

Using the [AnAge][] database contained within the Human Aging and Genomics Resources at [senescence.info][], we visit Peto's Paradox in an interactive and visual fashion.

Brought to you by:

- [ggplot2][]  
- [plotly][]  
- [workflowr][]  


[AnAge]: http://genomics.senescence.info/species/
[senescence.info]: http://www.senescence.info
[ggplot2]: http://ggplot2.org/
[plotly]: https://plot.ly/r/
[workflowr]: https://github.com/jdblischak/workflowr
